project.heading: Comprehensive Redesign & Rebuild of Existing Website
project.brief:
Objective:

To completely redesign and rebuild the Arrival Lifts website, creating a modern, professional, and user-friendly online presence that is accessible across all devices and optimized for search engines.

Scope of Work:

  1. Design and Aesthetics:
    • Develop a new, modern, and professional design that is simple yet elegant.
    • Ensure the website is fully responsive, working seamlessly on small to large screens.
    • Utilize the entire screen space effectively to enhance visual appeal.
    • Incorporate new, high-quality images to improve the overall look and feel.
  2. Features and Functionality:
    • Integrate social media links, including Twitter and LinkedIn, to enhance online presence and connectivity.
    • Include an option for visitors to download a pamphlet directly from the website.
    • Update the client list to reflect the most current information.
    • Create a standout, modern look while maintaining a professional appearance.
    • Ensure the website is interactive, user-friendly, and accessible.
    • Optimize the site for search engines to improve visibility and ranking.
  3. Content Structure:
    • Header Section: Feature the company name, contact details, and social media links.
    • About Us Section: Provide comprehensive information about the company, including a "Meet the Team" section and a downloadable brochure.
    • Products and Services Page: Detail the products and services offered by Arrival Lifts.
    • Clients Page: Showcase testimonials and an updated client list.
    • Projects Page: Highlight examples of work carried out with images and descriptions.
    • Contact Us Page: Include a contact form, email address, phone number, and physical address for inquiries and communication.
  4. Pages to be Built:
    • Homepage: Introduce the company with a modern design, featuring key services and links to other pages.
    • About: Provide detailed information about Arrival Lifts, including team introductions and a company brochure.
    • Services: Describe the range of services offered in detail.
    • Projects: Display completed projects with images and descriptions.
    • Contact/Enquiries Page: Facilitate communication with a contact form, email, phone number, and physical address.

Deliverables:

  • A fully redesigned and rebuilt Arrival Lifts website with a modern, professional design.
  • Responsive design that works across all devices, from small screens to large displays.
  • Integration of social media links (Twitter and LinkedIn).
  • Option for visitors to download a pamphlet.
  • Updated client list and new images.
  • Interactive, user-friendly, accessible, and search engine-optimized website.
  • Comprehensive header section with company name, contact details, and social links.
  • Detailed About Us section with team information and a downloadable brochure.
  • Products and Services page detailing offerings.
  • Clients page with testimonials.
  • Projects page showcasing completed work.
  • Contact Us page with a form and contact information.

This project aims to enhance the Arrival Lifts online presence, providing a visually appealing, functional, and professional website that effectively engages visitors and improves overall user experience.
